alert.note: Alert for Morton; Stanton; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 19 at 2:49PM CST until February 19 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 074... 084 AND 085... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Red Flag Warning For wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect until 7 PM CST this evening. * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 074 Stanton... Fire Weather Zone 084 Morton and Fire Weather Zone 085 Stevens. * Winds...South 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 to 15 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
